intro: Blastemanthus grandiflorus, commonly known as the large-flowered blastemanthus, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae and is characterized by its showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that are typically pink or red. Due to its ornamental value, it is cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
